INSTRUCTION_ZH: 根据所给的简体字（或繁体字）找出对应的繁体字（或简体字）。找对一个得1分，找错不扣分。
INSTRUCTION_EN: Find the corresponding simplified Chinese characters (traditional Chinese characters) according to the given traditional Chinese characters (simplified Chinese characters). 1 point will be given per correct character and no points will be deducted for incorrect characters.
